extension.name: plg_content_sexypollresults
extension.author: Gary Foster - DAFO Creative Ltd/LLC
extension.description: Displays Sexy Polling Reloaded results for a specified month using a shortcode. Supports multiple shortcodes per article.

field.name: default_type
field.label: Default Chart Type
field.description: Select which chart type should be used when the shortcode doesn’t specify one.

field.name: color_start
field.label: Gradient Start Color
field.description: Start color for the gradient bars or first pie color.

field.name: color_end
field.label: Gradient End Color
field.description: End color for the gradient bars or second pie color.

field.name: pie_size
field.label: Pie Chart Size (px)
field.description: Sets the width and height of the pie chart in pixels.

field.name: show_labels
field.label: Show Labels on Pie Slices
field.description: Display the answer and percentage inside each pie slice.
